activities.name: PurgePipelineAuditLog
activities.description:
Deletes data older than 30Days old

- PipelineAuditLog
-PipelineAuditDetailLog

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select	 pp.Pipeline
		,pp.SrcSystem
		,pp.EntityType
		,pp.SrcServer
		,pp.SrcDatabase
		,pp.DestSchema
		,pp.DestEntity
		,pp.Entity
		,pp.UpsertKeyColumn
		,cast(replace(cast(pp.FetchXML as nvarchar(max)),'operator="today"','operator="not-null"') as xml) as FetchXML
		,pp.IsActive
from	dbo.PipelineParameters pp
where	isActive = 1
and		pp.EntityType in ('Reference', 'Core_A','Core_B','Core_C', 'Transactional')
